request.bodyParameters:
Filter.source = EXTERNAL
Filter.perceivedSeverityList = { PS_MAJOR, PS_MINOR, PS_CLEARED, PS_CRITICAL }
Filter.probableCauseList = { BER_SD, EQPT, ENV }
Filter.acknowledgeIndication = AI_EVENT_ACKNOWLEDGED

testCase.response: Retrieves all external alarms satisfying the filter constraints of the requesting OS.

postconditions.success: The requesting OS has all the requested inventory information from the target OS.
postconditions.failure: The requesting OS does not have the entire requested inventory information from the target OS.

tests.comments:
This operation can only be directed to a top-level OS and not to a subordinate OS.
getActiveAlarmsCountResponse: activeAlarmCount = 0.
